answers.answer: What kind of work up have you had by doctors, other than was it a dermatologist and an allergy doctor?  Have you seen a neurologist, a rheumatologist, a cardiologist, a gastroenterologist, had any endocrine hormones tested such as thyroid function, have they checked for iron and vitamin B 12 deficiency, have you seen an ear, nose and throat doctor about the balance or has anyone gotten images of your brain and neck?  And have you visited a pastor for counsel about the anxiety issues and have you seen a psychiatrist to get medicine for the anxiety, butterflies and nerves on edge?

question: I have been suffering numerous symptons since I was born. I had convulsions as a baby, but also the fact my dad and brother carry diabetes and my mom arthritis and ezcema. I have aches and pains at different parts of my body at different times. I get acid reflux and have problems with digestion. I had ear, nose and throat problems as a child. I have muscle spasms, twitches, anxiety, butterflies/nerves on edge constantly. I feel I want to vomit especially in crowded rooms even after a few bites. I get overheated and sweat, palpitations, nausea, diarrhea and constipation at times and on different days. I lack concentration and balance and also spatial awareness at times. I get dry hands, feel thirsty. I get chronic tiredness especially after exercise and walking, standing or sitting for long periods. I have and diagnosed with ezcema, allergies, but also know I have arthritis (arthritic knee lump). My dad and brother both have diabetes. I have difficulty speaking, swallowing at times when my muscles just stop. Can you help at all with diagnosis?
title: Possibly dysautonomia
